lyrics_abstract:
Make ya feel good , make ya feel all right
One time
Feel good yea ya'll
Busta Rhymes in the place ya'll
Make you feel real good ya'll
Flipmode is the squad in the place ya'll

Buck wild for all of my niggas who don't care
floss like a bunch of young black millionaires
Makin ya run, me and my gun
Stackin my ones
floss a little, invest up in a mutual funds
Blowi[...]
